de.lambeck.pned.application

Class ApplicationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
      • de.lambeck.pned.application.AbstractApplicationController
        • de.lambeck.pned.application.ApplicationController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInfo_DrawingAreaSize, IInfo_MousePos, IInfo_SelectionRangeSize, IInfo_Status, java.awt.event.WindowFocusListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.event.WindowStateListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class ApplicationController
extends AbstractApplicationController
    Extends the abstract application controller. Observes the application (e.g. attempt to close with unsaved changes). Holds a reference to the status bar so that the application controller can show status messages etc.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> fileList
        This is the list of open files. (The full path name of the file or "New1", "New2"... for new models)

      • currNewFileIndex

        private int currNewFileIndex
        Counter for new models (e.g. "Untitled1", "Untitled2"... or "New1", "New2"...); counts continuously upwards.

      • importingFromPnml

        private boolean importingFromPnml
        Indicates whether we are importing data from a PNML file or not. This is important to avoid infinite loops when adding elements. (If true: changes to a data model need to be passed to the GUI model. If false: changes to a GUI model need to be passed to the data model.)

      • modifiedDataModels

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> modifiedDataModels
        List of data models which need to be saved.

      • refreshActiveFile

        private void refreshActiveFile()
        Determines the active tab "manually" to call setActiveFile(tabIndex). Note: This might be necessary in case there is no tab stateChanged event in the TabListener even if "current file" is no longer valid. Example: If the IDataModelController discards a corrupted file, all "current models" etc. that were prepared for this file will be reset to null. And because the tab for this file was not displayed yet, the TabListener cannot notice that another file is now active.

                         java.lang.String displayName)

        Parameters:
        fullName - The full path name of the PNML file
        displayName - The title of the tab (= the file name)

      • addTabForDrawPanel

        private void addTabForDrawPanel(DrawPanel drawPanel,
                                IValidationMsgPanel validationMsgPanel,
                                java.lang.String fullName,
                                java.lang.String displayName)
        Adds a new Tab for the specified DrawPanel. Note: The full path name us used as tool tip for the tab. (This can be used later to determine the current active file.)
        Parameters:
        drawPanel - The draw panel
        validationMsgPanel - The IValidationMsgPanel for the validation messages
        fullName - The full path name of the PNML file. (Intended to be the modelName of the draw panel!)
        displayName - The title of the tab (= the file name)

      • closeActiveFile

        private int closeActiveFile()
        Invokes closeFile(modelName) with the active file.
        Returns:
        The result of closeFile

      • closeFile

        private int closeFile(java.lang.String modelName)
        Closes the specified file.
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        Returns:
        OPERATION_SUCCESSFUL if an unmodified file was closed without saving, exit code depending on askSaveChanges if the file was modified and closeFile if the user selected "Yes"; otherwise UNEXPECTED_ERROR

      • closeFile

        private int closeFile(java.lang.String modelName,
                      boolean saveChanges)
        Closes the specified file.
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        saveChanges - Save changes before closing?
        Returns:
        OPERATION_SUCCESSFUL if an unmodified file was closed without saving, exit code of saveFile if file was modified; otherwise UNEXPECTED_ERROR

      • closeUnmodifiedFiles

        private void closeUnmodifiedFiles()
        Closes all unmodified files in fileList.

      • isFileModified

        private boolean isFileModified(java.lang.String modelName)
        Checks if a file was modified.
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        Returns:
        True if the file was modified; otherwise false

      • disposeFile

        private void disposeFile(java.lang.String modelName)
        Disposes the specified file (tab, draw panel, data and GUI model) without further questions.
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)

      • askSaveChanges

        private int askSaveChanges(java.lang.String modelName)
        Asks the user if he wants the file to be saved.
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        Returns:
        0 = YES_OPTION, 1 = NO_OPTION, 2 = CANCEL_OPTION; otherwise UNEXPECTED_ERROR

      • saveActiveFile

        private int saveActiveFile()
        Invokes saveFile(modelName) with the active file.
        Returns:
        The result of saveFile

      • saveFile

        private int saveFile(java.lang.String modelName)
        Saves the specified file.
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        Returns:
        Exit code of saveToExistingFile(), OPERATION_CANCELED if the user didn't chose a file name for a new file; otherwise UNEXPECTED_ERROR

      • saveToFile

        private int saveToFile(java.lang.String modelName,
                       java.lang.String saveAsFullName,
                       boolean displayAlerts)
        Saves to the specified file. Known limitation: modelName.equals(saveAsFullName) should be misleading on Linux because this OS can handle case-sensitive file names. But modelName.equalsIgnoreCase(saveAsFullName) cannot be used because Windows does not handle case-sensitive file names.
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        saveAsFullName - The full path name of the file to be written
        displayAlerts - Show an alert if a file already exists?
        Returns:
        Exit code OPERATION_SUCCESSFUL if the file was saved, OPERATION_FAILED if the file was not saved, OPERATION_CANCELED if the user canceled the operation; otherwise UNEXPECTED_ERROR

      • writeToPnmlFile

        private int writeToPnmlFile(IDataModel model,
                            java.lang.String saveAsFullName)
        Sends the content of the specified IDataModel to the PNMLWriter.
        Parameters:
        model - The specified model
        saveAsFullName - The full path name of the file to be written
        Returns:
        Exit code OPERATION_SUCCESSFUL if the file was written, OPERATION_FAILED if the file was not written; otherwise UNEXPECTED_ERROR

      • getPnmlWriter

        private PNMLWriter getPnmlWriter(java.lang.String saveAsFullName)
        Returns a writer for PNML files.
        Parameters:
        saveAsFullName - The full path name of the file to be written
        Returns:
        PNMLWriter initialized with the specified file.

      • saveActiveFileAs

        private int saveActiveFileAs(java.io.File pnmlFile)
        Invokes saveFileAs(modelName, pnmlFile) with the active file.
        Parameters:
        pnmlFile - The specified File
        Returns:
        Exit code is the exit code of saveFileAs; otherwise UNEXPECTED_ERROR

      • saveFileAs

        private int saveFileAs(java.lang.String modelName,
                       java.lang.String saveAsFullName)
        Saves the specified file as the specified File.
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        saveAsFullName - The full path name of the file to be written
        Returns:
        Exit code is the exit code of saveToExistingFile(); otherwise UNEXPECTED_ERROR
